# atinux/content-wind (github.com)

<https://github.com/atinux/content-wind>

## Description

A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website. Powered by Nuxt Content, TailwindCSS and Iconify. - atinux/content-wind

## Quote

> A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website. Powered by Nuxt Content, TailwindCSS and Iconify.

## Tags

#nuxt #nuxt-content #nuxt-theme #Vue

## Content Wind {#content-wind dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#content-wind){#user-content-content-wind aria-label="Permalink: Content Wind"}

[![License](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fd343e85c9a135ab5c48caa50a2a2e0e84a5f454d9b998812702909c5def0ed5/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f6769746875622f6c6963656e73652f4174696e75782f636f6e74656e742d77696e642e7376673f7374796c653d666c617426636f6c6f72413d31383138314226636f6c6f72423d323843463844){canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/Atinux/content-wind.svg?style=flat&colorA=18181B&colorB=28CF8D"}](https://github.com/Atinux/content-wind/blob/main/LICENSE)
[![Nuxt](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/643e40e6e2135a80d66d0757bf828c2f63e88c3d39a551c192debe53d8b9790f/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f4e7578742d3138313831423f266c6f676f3d6e7578742e6a73){canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Nuxt-18181B?&logo=nuxt.js"}](https://nuxt.com/){rel="nofollow"}
[![Nuxt Studio](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4c284f47ede11fffdd8f359229abe3cd28277742ccca4a921804e4716be63da8/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f4f70656e253230696e2532304e75787425323053747564696f2d3138313831423f266c6f676f3d6e7578742e6a73266c6f676f436f6c6f723d334242354543){canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Open%20in%20Nuxt%20Studio-18181B?&logo=nuxt.js&logoColor=3BB5EC"}](https://nuxt.studio/templates/content-wind){rel="nofollow"}

A personal website theme powered by [Nuxt Content](https://content.nuxt.com/){rel="nofollow"}, [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/){rel="nofollow"}, [Iconify](https://iconify.design/){rel="nofollow"} and [Vue components](https://vuejs.org/){rel="nofollow"}.

-   ðŸ“–Â  [Demo & Docs](https://content-wind.nuxt.space/){rel="nofollow"}
-   ðŸ•¹Â  [Play online](https://githubblitz.com/Atinux/content-wind/tree/main/.demo){rel="nofollow"}
-   ðŸ‘€Â  [Demo video](https://twitter.com/Atinux/status/1578505586979012608){rel="nofollow"}

## Features {#features dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#features){#user-content-features aria-label="Permalink: Features"}

-   Create pages in Markdown in the `content/` directory
-   Use [Nuxt layouts](https://nuxt.com/docs/guide/directory-structure/layouts){rel="nofollow"} in your Markdown pages
-   Enjoy meta tag generation from Markdown files
-   Configurable prose components with [Nuxt Typography](https://typography.nuxt.space/){rel="nofollow"}
-   Generated navigation based on your pages
-   Switch between Light & Dark mode ðŸŒ”
-   Access 200,000 icons from 100+ icon sets with the `<Icon>` component
-   Highlight code blocks with [Shiki](https://shiki.style/){rel="nofollow"}
-   Create Vue components and use them in Markdown
-   Deploy on any Node or Static hosting: GH Pages, Vercel, Netlify, Heroku, etc.
-   Live edit on [Nuxt Studio](https://nuxt.studio/){rel="nofollow"}

## Get started {#get-started dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#get-started){#user-content-get-started aria-label="Permalink: Get started"}

### Local {#local dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#local){#user-content-local aria-label="Permalink: Local"}

    npx nuxi@latest init -t github:atinux/content-wind my-website

Then follow the instructions and you are ready to go ðŸš€

## About

A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website. Powered by Nuxt Content, TailwindCSS and Iconify.
